value.title: DAX Fridays! #27: RELATED vs RELATEDTABLE
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will go through two functions in DAX, related and relatedtable.  We will explain how they both work and when to use one or the other. value.title: DAX Fridays! #44: CROSSFILTER
value.excerpt: IN todays video, we will go trough an example on how crossfilter works. Crossfilter can simulate relationships and active and deactivate them as you need to. value.title: DAX Fridays! #49: SELECTEDVALUE
